::KitKat::

She lay there, still alittle out of it.  She looke at him and 
nodded.  She very slowly sat up.  Looking around and waiting for her 
eyes to come into focus.  She looked at Drillbit and smiled slightly 
at him.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> Drillbit looked into her eyes. 
> "How do you feel, my love? We need to get out there. The base is 
under
> attack."
> 
> ::K-9::
> 
> K-9 kept shooting at the Pred cave. He saw Phobia's ship raise to 
the
> sky.
> "Holy shit!" He raised his rifle, and started shooting at the ships
> weopons. He hoped the shields would fail.
